properties.areaDesc: Treutlen, GA; Montgomery, GA; Wheeler, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 8:29AM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Oconee River near Mount Vernon.
* From this evening until Wednesday morning.
* At 8 AM Monday the stage was 15.3 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 16.2 feet by Tuesday morning.The river will fall
below flood stage by early Wednesday morning.
* At 16 feet...Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the
woodlands...pastures and natural flood plain along the river
upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 280. Flood
waters reach the top of a boat ramp by the bridge on the Wheeler
County side of the River.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
